tool_description: Check if a domain is available. 10,000 free requests including domain availability checks. Returns WHOIS data including expiration dates.
name: Domaination.io
title: Domaination.io

api_list.name: Domain Availability
api_list.description: This API returns information about the provided domain name. Domain data includes availability for registration, expiration date, status, creation date, registrar, etc. Depending on the TLD some fields may not be available. The domain availability flag is set for all domains regardless of TLD.

api_list.name: Supported TLDs
api_list.description: This API returns a list of TLDs supported for the Domain Availability API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domaination.p.rapidapi.com/tlds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domaination.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domaination.p.rapidapi.com/tlds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domaination.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
